question:
Which among the following matches of vegetation zones with the associated mean annual average temperature are correct?
1. Tropical- Above 24°C
2. Sub-tropical- 17°C to 24°C
3. Temperate- 7°C to 17°C
4. Alpine- Below 7°C
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Tropical- Above 24°C (Hot and Humid weather, abundant rainfall). Sub-tropical- 17°C to 24°C (Between tropical and Temperate zone). Temperate- 7°C to 17°C (Between tropic and polar region, summer warm, winter long cold and snowy). Alpine- Below 7°C (Plants grow at high elevations, mosses and lichens).
